name: DiDungeons
description:
The game is simple, but it's addicting. You're an adventurer in a dungeon and you have to jump over as many obstacles as possible to get the most points compared to the rest of the world. Battle your friends to see who can survive the longest, or just use this easy game to kill time. The game is free so there's no harm in trying it out for yourself! Have tons of fun and get your adrenaline pumping with DiDungeons! You can play solo or battle a friend in this game. Because of the maps always being different when you play, you'll never get bored of the content. You can even race against the world to see who can top the leaderboard! Play DiDungeons today!
